pullrequest.title: Add battery class (redo of pull request #1782)

content.raw:
The battery seems to keep on being consumed even after the voltage is over, so the voltage goes negative. I also observed that sometimes after a few steps it might go back to positive, but eventually it settles at zero.

![battery.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/jgXqbo/images/3320300473-battery.png)
content.html: The battery seems to keep on being consumed even after the voltage is over, so the voltage goes negative. I also observed that sometimes after a few steps it might go back to positive, but eventually it settles at zero.
